tool.name: iso2flux
tool.description: 13C Metabolic Flux Analysis on a sub-network of a large scale model.
tool.command:
ln -s "$sbml_model" model.sbml;
create_and_solve_iso2flux_model.py -e "$tracing_data" #if $tracing_model -l "$tracing_model" #end if
-c model.sbml
#if $constraints -f "$constraints" #end if
#if str( $confidence.compute ) == "yes": -i #end if

param.name: tracing_data
param.label: Tracing data
param.help: Processed Metabolights file containing isotopologues distribution, output of midcor.

param.name: tracing_model
param.label: Tracing model
param.help: CSV file describing the label propagation rules.

param.name: sbml_model
param.label: SBML Model
param.help: Describes the constraint based model that will be used

param.name: constraints
param.label: Constraints file
param.help: CSV file containing additional constraints for the optimization model (Optional)

data.name: best_fit_fluxes
data.help: Simulated fluxes that are most consistent with experimental measurements
data.label: Best fit fluxes

data.name: best_fit_label
data.help: The simulated label with the best fluxes experimental measurements
data.label: Best fit label

data.name: constrained_sbml_model
data.help: SBML model constraiend with the results of the 13C analysis.
data.label: SBML model constrained with the results of 13C analysis

data.name: fluxes_confidence
data.help: Lower and upper limits of the confidence intervals for fluxes
data.label: Confidence intervals for all fluxes

tool.help: A script that performs 13C Metabolic Flux Analysis with the software Iso2flux. It will find the flux distribution most consistent with experimental tracer data and, if not disabled, also estimate confidence interval for fluxes.
